index.aboutWebsiteContent1: This website was created for entertainment in order to learn containerization and deployment of the project on remove server. In addition, I wanted to build the basis of client-server monolithic architecture that I can use in future projects. Here you will find some information about me and my projects. The source code of
index.aboutWebsiteContent4: My pet projects are only in gamedev and I have no desire to show them yet. Therefore, I had the idea to create this website. It's simple and its static version could easily be created in notepad, but I had a goal of demonstrating my knowledge rather than the desire to create a practical product.
